headline: Engine Overhaul or New Truck? A Brutally Honest Guide for Small Carriers Facing the Big Diesel Decision
summary: If you’re an owner-operator or small fleet owner staring down the barrel of an engine problem, you already know the feeling—an uneasy mix of fear, frustration, and that sinking question in your gut: The post Engine Overhaul or New Truck? A Brutally Honest Guide for Small Carriers Facing the Big Diesel Decision appeared first on FreightWaves.
